edge: MOVIE's SUMMARY is a part of MOVIE
Paris Hilton starred in the film titled 'The Hottie & The Nottie'.
Joel David Moore portrayed the character of Nate Cooper in the movie.
Christine Lakin played the role of Cristabel Abbott in the film.
Production of 'The Hottie & The Nottie' began in January 2007.
Paris Hilton received the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Actress in 2008, which was for her role in 'The Hottie & The Nottie'.
In the film, Cristabel Abbott still maintains friendship with the same short, unattractive brunette girl whom Nate also knew in elementary school.
